meta.title: Stefan Weiß | IT Specialist for Application Development
meta.description: Portfolio of Stefan Weiß – Fachinformatiker für Anwendungsentwicklung. Java, Kotlin, Spring Boot, React, Angular. Clean code and maintainable software.

hero.tagline: Focus on object-oriented software development. Solid knowledge in Java, Kotlin and modern frontend technologies. Structured, reliable way of working and high standards for clean, maintainable code.

about.title: About Me
about.text: Prospective IT specialist for application development with a focus on object-oriented software development. Solid knowledge in Java, Kotlin (incl. Android) and modern frontend technologies. Structured, reliable way of working and high demand for clean, maintainable code.

items.title: Gebäudemanagement Marx
items.description: Custom website for a building management company. Design in Figma, implementation with React and TypeScript, containerized with Docker.

items.title: Fewozeno – Booking & Occupancy Plan
items.description: Digital solution for Fewozeno. Booking and occupancy plan for 90+ vacation rentals – central overview and management.
Development and maintenance of warehouse and tour planning software (C++, C#). Involvement in internal projects with Angular, TypeScript, ASP.NET and CI/CD pipeline setup.

items.company: District Office Berchtesgadener Land, Bad Reichenhall
items.description: Work across several departments with focus on IT. Support as system integrator, setup and maintenance of workstations. Insights into IT infrastructure and administrative processes.
Involvement in branch operations: goods receipt, warehouse organization, customer advice and support in the sales area.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: I'm open to new opportunities and would love to hear from you.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: The protection of your personal data is important to us. Below we inform you about the processing of data on this website.

responsible.title: Responsible Party
responsible.text: The party responsible for data processing on this website is the person named in the imprint.

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.text: This website is hosted by an external provider. In the process, personal data (e.g. IP address, time of access) may be transmitted to the host. Please refer to the provider's privacy policy for details.

access.title: Access Data
access.text: When you visit this website, access data (e.g. IP address, date, page accessed) are automatically recorded in server logs. These data are used to ensure operation and security and are not combined with other data unless required by law.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: If you contact us by e-mail or contact form, your details will be processed and stored for the purpose of handling your enquiry.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: You have the right to access, rectification, erasure and restriction of processing of your personal data, as well as to data portability and to object. To exercise these rights, please contact the address given in the imprint. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.

changes.title: Changes
changes.text: This privacy policy may be updated as necessary to reflect legal or website changes.

dispute.title: Dispute Resolution
dispute.text: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS): https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr. We are not obliged and not willing to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
